name: get_fuel_economy_information
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool car_utils.
Tool description: FREE resources for checking VIN, getting the market value of your car, estimating the cost of ownership in US,  checking fuel economy, and more to come.
API description: Fetches fuel economy information for a specified vehicle from the official U.S. government source.

model.description: The vehicle model. Use the /models endpoint to get supported models for the specified make.

make.description: The vehicle make. Use the /makes endpoint to get supported makes.

year.description: Model year. Currently supports model years from 1985 to 2023. Defaults to '2023'.
